features: Auto Power Save, Date/Time Stamp, PictBridge Support, blur warning, display brightness control, face-priority AF function, in-camera red-eye fix, multi-picture burst
connectortypes: 1 x USB, 1 x composite video output
screendetails: LCD display - TFT active matrix - 2.5" - colour
operatingsystemsupported: Apple MacOS X 10.1.5 or later, MS Windows 2000, MS Windows 98 SE, MS Windows ME, MS Windows XP
flashmodes: Auto Mode, Fill-in mode, flash OFF mode, red-eye reduction, slow synchro
shootingprograms: Backlight, Beach/snow, Close-up, Copy, Dawn/dusk, Fireworks, Landscape, Museum, Night landscape, Night portrait, Panorama assist, Party/indoor, Portrait mode, Sports mode, Sunset
